name: [Update 0.1] EcoToss
description:
Casual and educational game, which you as a student try to throw your trash based on their category as much as possible before you lose by your own mistake or intruder.

The Eco's team members:

  • 1494077163101-37 - Arhammirza Ibrahim - Game Designer
  • 1494077163101-39 - Kevin Livery - 3D Artist
  • 1494077163101-43 - Harryanto - Lead Game Programmer
  • 149251970101-14 - Ismail - Game Programmer
  • 1494077163100-32 - Vivian Azalia Anwari - Game Programmer
